professional_summary: Geospatial Database Administrator with expertise in GIS server administration, SQL Server management, and large-scale data handling. Skilled in troubleshooting Esri technology issues and publishing GIS data on web platforms.

work_experience.company: Sponsorship required to work in the US
key_responsibilities: Extracted features from raw mobile mapping LiDAR points cloud.
Loaded and managed large-scale data using feature extraction workflows from multiple sources into the Geodatabase.
Provided technical review for GIS components and received feedback.
